data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix sibirica (Siberian larch) from sample UGLALASI-51

Exposition NE, Slope 5 deg, Geology: Ranker/Gneis, Tree line 2500 m, av. Tree height 16 m, Tree cover 5%, Shrub cover 60%, Herb cover 20%, Moss cover 95%, Vegatation type: Lä-Wald auf Blockschutt, Film number: 1046A
